attributes.action: Don't let the motorcycle ban come to the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
European life wreckers in Brussels intend to ban all motorcycles from the roads for good because they view them as too "dangerous" see MCN 

Surely this goes against our civil writes to do as we please within the boundaries of the law

The idea of the ban is to have a zero death toll on the roads and they say this will happen if you take bikes off the road... I do nearly 100,000miles a year with work nearly all the accidents i see on the road are with cars. 
STOP PICKING ON US BIKERS BECAUSE YOU THINK WE ARE ALL HELLS ANGELS (NO OFFENCE INTENDED AGAINST THE GROUP)

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/foreverride/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
